p: We recorded pre-operative conditions, including phimosis (n = 58, 1.2%) and paraphimosis (n = 18, 0.4%). Doctors performed proportionately more circumcisions on clients with phimosis (X 2 = 15.55; p<0.0001 and paraphimosis (X 2 = 35.34; p<00001) compared to CAs. Doctors and CAs circumcised similar proportions of clients with other pre-existing conditions such as diabetes (X 2 = 0.05; p = 0.815), hypertension (X 2 = 0.007; p = 0.935) or HIV (X 2 = 0.35; p = 0.554) ( Table 2).
